Title: Relates to the payment of wages to workers
Summary: Provides for compensation to workers to be commensurate with the experience and expertise needed.
LawCode: Rpld Chap of 2019 (as proposed in S.6265-A & A.8083-A); add ยง42-a, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to the payment of wages to workers; and to repeal a chapter of the laws of 2019, amending the labor law relating to ensuring that utility employees receive the prevailing wage
